Translations.Text: Nnan: "day a k namen, mi ddan yidek imezwura n laaouo
Inna: "ur eoi$ ayen xeddmen
Aqeiii nnsen $eo Mass iw kan, lemmer tessinem
Ur swexxioe$, nek, lmumnin
Nek d aneddao kan ipbeginnen
Nnan: "ma ur tfukkev, a Nue, war ccekk, a ppepwaoeomev
Inna: "a Mass iw! S tidep, inkeo iyi ugdud iw
Seyyi ferru gari yidsen. Sellek a$, nek, akked lmumnin i illan yidi
Nsellek it, neppa, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo iccuoen
Sinna, deffir waya, Ne$ves wid igwran
Deg wayagi, d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Aad skaddben imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen Hud: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a tbennum, di yal ti$ilt, assekni i tfukal nnwen
La tepparam lebouj, amar haat a pwekkoem
Ma tewwtem, tekkatem s leqsee
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Eezzbet i Win i wen Ifkan ayen teeoam
Ifka yawen lmal, tarwa
tibeirin, tiliwa
Nek, ugade$ aaaqeb fellawen, ass ameqwoaean
Nnan: "iaadel $uone$ tnubav, ne$ ur tnubav
Ih, ayagi, siwa d asnulfu imezwura
Ur nelli d wid ara ippuaaqben
Nekoen t. Nesqucc iten. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Tamud skaddben imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen UuUalie: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a kwen ooen, deg wayen illan dagi, testumnem
Di tebeirin akked tliwa
deg igran, tizdayin s ppemoa leqqaqen
La tneooem, d ccaioin, ixxamen deg idurar
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur ssemeaset i lameo iballa$en
i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "kecc, aql ak kan, seg ioehbaniyen
Kecc d amdan kan, am nekwni. Awi d assekni, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Inna: "tal$wemt agi, a ppessew deg wass is, kunwi a ppesswem deg wass nnwen

Gezmen as tigwecrar, gwran d di nndama
Iwwet iten uaaqeb. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n Lui iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen UuLui: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Teppeddum ar ddkeo deg imavalen
Teooam tilawin i wen d Ixleq Mass nnwen? Ihi, kunwi d agdud izegren tilas
Nnan: "ma ur tfukkev, a Lui, a k nenfu
Inna: "nek, seg wid ikeohen igiten nnwen
A Mass iw, sellek iyi, nek akked twacult iw, seg igiten nnsen
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, meooa
siwa tam$aot, ar wid igwran
Sinna, Nessenger wiyav
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur. I icmet ugeffur n wid ippunedoen
Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n At Teegi iskaddeb imazanen
